text: Ara ceye dekho! Amara grhake manusera jan'ya sam'melanasthala o nirapatta-sthana baniyechilama. Ara “makkama-i-ibrahimake upasana-bhumi karo.” Ara amara ibrahima o isama'ilera prati nirdesa diyechilama -- “amara grha pabitra kare rekho ta'oyaphakaridera o i’tikaphakaridera o ruku-sijadakaridera jan'ya.”
